title: The Last Cat in the Universe - Novel Updates
tags: Animal Characteristics   Childish Protagonist   Cultivation   Cute Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   Futuristic Setting   Hard-Working Protagonist   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Kind Love Interests   Language Barrier   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Knowledge   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Outer Space   Pets   Shapeshifters   Strong Love Interests   Transported to Another World
author: 醉饮长歌
description:
During his patrol, Ji Xiuyun, a marshal of the Empire, was ambushed and went missing. When he returned, there was a pure white creature crouching on his army cap.

Through genetic testing, it was determined that this cute and delicate little fellow was a creature that had faded away with the humans’ mother planet 2000 years ago—a cat.

The last cat in the universe!

The people of the Empire were frenzied!>
